item.title: The Resurgence of Retro Games: A Pixelated Renaissance or a Soul-Crushing Cash Grab?
item.description: Some argue that remasters are a necessary evil, allowing classic games to be enjoyed by a new generation of gamers. Others think that they are destroying the original game's charm and erasing the nostalgia that many players hold dear.
item.dc:creator: wwakabobik

item.title: Horror games of 90s
item.description: Halloween is coming! Let's remember best chilling PC games of 90s. If you like horror games, you should definitely check out these classics!
item.dc:creator: wwakabobik

item.title: My history of first-person view party-based RPG
item.description: I love first-person view party-based RPGs. Here is a list of games I played and my thoughts about them and future of the genre.
item.dc:creator: wwakabobik
